transcript:
Customer: Hanshidan ji.
Executive: Ji, namaskar sir, kaise hain?
Customer: Namaskar sir, bataye sir.
Executive: Main keh raha hu baat hui kya unse kuch?
Customer: Kinse?
Executive: Vahi Mumbai wale na jo visit karne ke liye aane wale the.
Customer: Ha, vo vo jawab nahi de rahe hai. Maine kaha sir agar aap side ka video bhej do aap. Han. Maine kaha agar sir aap side side ka jaha kaam hona hai na. Uska agar video bhej do.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Vo bhej nahi rahe. Hmm. Vo bhej nahi rahe to iska matlab fraud hi hai.
Executive: Isko kaam karana hoga vo to mol bhav to karega.
Customer: Han mol bhav to karega hi. Baki vo keh rahe the ki matlab aa jao aap main kharcha de dunga uski bhi baat nahi hui.
Executive: Hmm?
Customer: Maine bheja sir maine kaha sir main premium tatkal ka ticket nikal leta hu. Aap jao bhi chahe to bhej do.
Executive: Han han.
Customer: Jawab nahi de rahe. To sir phir reply nahi aaya.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Han to ya to matlab vo aise hi honge ki matlab taal rahe honge ya to matlab. Nahi nahi chal raha hai kai time se chal raha hai.
Executive: Do teen saal se chal raha hai. Ek do do teen makrana mein bando ke sath hua bhi.
Customer: Hmm. Ye cheez.
Executive: Han nahi aisa bhi ho sakta hai jaise ho sakta hai unke aas pass mein kahi kisi dealer se baat ho gayi ho. Nahi nahi vo bula ke na phone vagera jeb mein paisa aadmi jair si baat hai Bombay ja raha hai to paisa to leke jayega 15-20 hazaar to jeb mein.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Han to vo to hai isiliye ab vo reply nahi kar rahe. Jeb mein paisa hai.
Executive: Han. Nahi koi nahi agar aap kaho to main ek baar dobara phone laga ke dekhu kal. Nahi nahi dobara baat karo sir aap customer ban ke baat karo phir aap temple vagera phir aapko kya bolte hai.
Customer: Nahi koi nahi main IndiaMART ki taraf se hi baat karunga main kahunga unse ki aap matlab baat karo ek baar unse kyuki baat nahi karoge to kaise deal fix karoge. Han. Hai na aisa to hai nahi ki kisi ko koi sapna aa raha hai jo baitha hai hai ghar pe vo kya jayega.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Nahi jisko kaam karana hoga vo side ka video bhi dalega video dikhayega bhi sir ye kaam karna hai kya hai.
Executive: Han aur kya.
Customer: Hmm. Ye sir marble tile mein to aap kaam karte nahi hai but phir bhi aapne iski paanch buylead li. Marble ki tiles aati hai na sir.
Executive: Accha jo vo slab aate hai jo.
Customer: Marble jo cut size hota hai usko marble tiles hi bolte hai. Aur koi to aati nahi marble baki to ceramic tiles aati hai.
Executive: Hum jaise marble cut size bolte hai na to 12.
Customer: Han.
Executive: Wale usko tiles bolte hai marble ki.
Customer: Accha. Hmm. Aur ye ek aur hai. Hum bhi jaise tiles hi bolte hai marble tiles le lo sir cut size mein. Han matlab apne apne ha apne local language mein bolte hai na log. Han jaise badi tappi kare kutarti hai na. To uske chote piece mein bana dete hai hum jaise 2 by 2 ho gaya 2.25 ho gaya 2.15 ho gaya 10-15 size bante hai. To usko hum marble cut size bolte hai aur bahar ke log marble tiles bolte hai.
Executive: Han marble tiles vo floor flooring vagera ke liye lete honge na to isliye usko tiles bolte hai.
Customer: Han sab baki to duniya mein sab ceramic tile hi aati hai.
Executive: Ceramic tile. Nahi actually vo usme dikh raha tha na to mujhe laga ki tiles to aapke paas hai nahi. Koi baat nahi kal main kal aapne koi buylead kharidi thi kya? Ji.
Customer: Kal koi buylead kharidi thi kya aapne?
Executive: Kharidi to nahi.
Customer: Accha. Ye try kiya tha kharidne ke liye?
Executive: Hmm?
Customer: Try kiya tha kya kharidne ke liye?
Executive: Kya?
Customer: Main keh raha hu koi buylead kharidne ke liye try kiya tha kya matlab koi buylead aap. Nahi vo actually Nepal ka jo kaam tha Nepal ka jo kaam tha maine usko matlab karna chaha to vo matlab aisa likha hua aaya tha.
Executive: Usme package mang raha hoga na paise mang raha hoga.
Customer: Han. Han han han han vahi to na vo mere paas notification aaya tha. Usme na vo matlab export ka plan alag hota hai usme kya hai ki aapko export ka plan lena hota hai usme phir aapko India ke bahar ki lead milti hai.
Executive: Ji ji ji. To isiliye vo lead aapko mil rahi hai.
Customer: Jaise ye hai.
Executive: Tender ka aata hai tender ka isme kitni lead jati hai?
Customer: Lead matlab?
Executive: Tender ka aata hai na tender ka to tender ka aapki taraf se aata hai na ki sir 16 tender aaye hue hai vo tender hai to matlab tender se deal karne ke liye buyleads jati hai kya kitni jati hai?
Customer: Vo matlab buy now hota hi nahi hai.
Executive: Tender tender aata hai na. Hmm. To tender mein vaise jaise aap buylead consume karte hai vaise aapko tender consume karna hota hai vaha par likha hota hai view tender information. Han to vo tender wale pe click karte hai vo hota hi nahi hai sir buy now. Kya batata hai? Hmm? Kya batata hai?
Customer: Vo buyleads kam batata hai abhi. Bole itni buyleads mein aap kar hi nahi paoge contact.
Executive: Package mangta hai kya?
Customer: Han sir.
Executive: Ek minute ruko aap. Tender ka jo bhi kaam aata hai na bade kaam tender wale. Han ek minute ruko. Vo matlab vo consume hota hi nahi.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Kal aapne liya tha kya tender?
Executive: Nahi. Vo aapki taraf se daily message aata hai tender ka. To vo tender click hi nahi hota buy now hota hi nahi vo. Matlab kis se contact kare?
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Accha. Abhi na aapke paas daily bonus aaj ki do buylead bachi hui hai aapke paas theek hai. Aap ek baar aaj karke dekhna aaj I think mil jayega aapko. Aur aaj Sunday hai na aaj ye aapko allocation hua hai leads ka right to 30 lead aapke paas vo bhi hai. Pure week wali hai. Theek hai aur do aaj wali hai 32 lead hai abhi aapke paas to aap aaj ek baar tender pe click karke dekhna tender pehle check kar lena ki kaun sa tender badhiya hai aapke liye. Right abhi to aa raha hai ye Chandraganj hospital Mirzapur ka aa raha hai. Isme marble relevant temple ka tender aayega vo ispe click karke dekhenge phir main aapko screenshot dalta hu. Han click karke dekho agar nahi hota to aap mujhe screenshot dalo main dekhta hu kya dikkat aa rahi hai. Theek hai? Hmm. Okay. Recent mein dekhna aap theek hai. Theek hai ji. Theek hai Sidhant ji rakh de. Han theek hai theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Unable to contact Mumbai client for site visit.

- Client not sending site video.

- Tenders are not working, buy now option missing.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested to try again as customer.

- Executive will check screenshot of tender issue.

- Executive informed about available buyleads.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send screenshot of tender issue.



Alert (If Any):

fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, tender, fraud, marble tiles
